definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be complete, sound (NH id. (Jastr), Ph. [[שלם]] Pi. complete, requite, esp. in n.pr., Lzb:376 GACooke:99, also 81, 111, etc.; Ar. 4lem be safe, secure, free from fault, II. make over, resign to, IV. resign or submit oneself, esp. to God, whence ptcp. Muslim, and inf. Islām prop. submission to God; As. šalâmu, be complete, unharmed, be paid; Aram. [[שְׁלֵים]], salima be complete, safe, Targum peaceful; OAram. [[שלם]] reward, repay (Pa; in n.pr.); cf. Sab. [[סלם]] peace Hom:Chr 124, Ar. 4lem, also silmun safety, security; As. šulmu, welfare; Eth. sla0mun Di:322 security peace; Aram. [[שְׁלָמָא]], 4lomo0 security, welfare, OAram. [[שלם]] Lzb:376, esp. = submission, in n.pr. RS:Sem.79 f.; Bondi:70 (after Brugsch), cp. šarmā, greet, do homage, as loan-word in Egypt.);—
be complete, finished, ended: temple 1Ki 7:51 = 2Ch 5:1; walls of city Ne 6:15; of time Is 60:20.

make whole or good, restore thing lost Joe 2:25, or stolen Ex 21:37 (E); pay a debt 2Ki 4:7, Ps 37:21, Pr 22:27, Job 41:3; make compensation, for injury Le 24:18, Le 24:21 (P); for trespass in sacred things Le 5:16 (P).

make good, i.e. pay, vows, c. acc. [[נֶדֶר]] De 23:22, 2Sa 15:7 + 9 t., + (c. [[ל]] to God) Ps 50:14, Ps 66:13, Ps 116:14, Ps 116:18; obj. om. Ps 76:12; abs. Is Is 19:21; c. acc. [[תּוֹדוֹת]] c. [[ל]] to God Ps 56:13; [[פרים שׂפתינו]] Ho 14:3 (v. p. 830:b).

requite, recompense, reward, good 1Sa 24:20, Ru 2:12; evil Is 65:6, Je 51:56; c. [[ל]] pers. De 7:10 + 4 t., + (c. acc. rei) Je 51:24; [[אל]] pers. Job 21:19; acc rei Pr 20:22, Je 16:18; [[שְׁלַּם גְּמוּל לְ]] Is 59:18, Is 59:18 (but v. I. [[שִׁלֵּם]]), Is 66:6 + (v. [[גְּמוּל]]); † [[פּׂעַל לְ]] ´[[שׁ]]: Job 34:11; [[גְּמוּל עַל]] ´[[שׁ]]: Joe 4:4; [[עַל חֵיק]] Is 65:6; [[אֶל־חַיק]] Je 32:18; † c. [[ל]] pers. and [[כ]] of deeds, ´[[שׁ]]: reward according to one’s works 2Sa 3:39 + 3 t.; acc. pers. Ps 31:24; acc. rei † [[רעה תחת טובה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ge 44:4 (J) + Ge 35:12, Ge 38:21 (read [[מְשַׁלְּמֵנִי]]).
be repaid, requited, Je 18:20, Pr 11:31, Pr 13:13.
